means: 埃塞俄比亚（非洲东部国家）

sentence.Network_en: Ethiopia'sart springs from her early Christian as well as her Muslim heritage.
sentence.Network_cn: 埃塞俄比亚的艺术起源于其早期的基督教和伊斯兰教文化遗产。

sentence.Network_en: It's a similar picture across the border in Ethiopia.
sentence.Network_cn: 在边界那边的埃塞俄比亚，情况也大致相似。

sentence.Network_en: Ethiopia has almost the lowest oil consumption per capita in the world.
sentence.Network_cn: 埃塞俄比亚的人均石油耗费量几乎是全世界最低的。

list.abs: 耶加雪菲（Ethiopia Yirgacheffe）这个名字来源于一个咖啡的品种。这种咖啡入口的时候有微微的苦味，但喉韵带有甜味，这种甜味 …
非洲衣索比亚最有名的咖啡产区就是耶加雪夫 (Ethiopia Yirgacheffe)，耶加雪夫是一个小镇，位于衣索比亚中南部的 Gedeo区，海拔1…
the historic route and northern ethiopia ., 历史路线及埃塞俄比亚北部.
many members of tribes in southern ethiopia have resisted the temptation to move to cities and abandon their cultural traditions .埃塞俄比亚南部有许多部落成员抵挡住了搬往城市，放弃自己文化传统的诱惑。

means.word_mean: 1. Ethiopia is a republic in northeastern Africa on the Red Sea; formerly called Abyssinia
